hub_float
hub_float

A custom floating-point class with configurable precision and a "hub" bit for consistent rounding.

The hub_float class implements a floating-point format that uses a special "hub" bit.  Internally, values are stored as doubles that are quantized to lie on a specific grid determined by the exponent, mantissa, and the extra "hub" bit (an implicit least significant bit).
